pages.text: Originally bred to hunt stags, Greyhounds are now best known for rabbit hunting and racing.$(br2)Standing at over a block tall, these speedy dogs come in seven different coats.
These dogs are most commonly found in windswept hills and savannas. They can more rarely be found in various badlands and sparse jungles.
pages.title: Location
Taming
pages.text: These dogs can be tamed with a Mutton or Rabbit Treat.
